sentences.sContent: BATHROOMS: A man has five items in his bathroom: a toothbrush, shaving cream, razor, a bar of soap, and a towel from the Holiday Inn.
sentences.sContent_eng: BATHROOMS: A man has five items in his bathroom: a toothbrush, shaving cream, razor, a bar of soap, and a towel from the Holiday Inn.
sentences.sCn: 一个男人在他的盥洗室里有五件东西：一把牙刷，剃须膏，剃刀，一盒肥皂和从假日旅馆顺来的一条毛巾。

words.tran: 山脊尖削的；脊背锋利的
狭尖的背脊；剃刀鲸；尖背野猪

trans.tranOther: a tool with a sharp blade, used to remove hair from your skin
